title: Finding tanx
text: $$tanx=$$ length of opposite $$\frac{leg}{length}$$ of adjacent leg
speech: tanx is equal to  length of opposite , fraction, l e g, over length,   of adjacent leg

title: Lengths
text: The length of the leg opposite of A is $$a=84$$, the length of the leg adjacent to A is $$b=13$$, and the length of the hypotenuse is $$c=85$$.
speech: The length of the leg opposite of A is  a is equal to 84 , the length of the leg adjacent to A is  b, is equal to 13 , and the length of the hypotenuse is  c, is equal to 85 .
